message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
You went too high, I'll meet you halfway!
I'm willing to take a bigger risk, but I'm not going all in yet!
I'm willing to compromise, but not too much!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm willing to make a deal, but don't expect me to give away too much!
I'm getting close to the edge, but I'll try to squeeze out a bit more!
I'm taking control, Bob! You're running out of options!
I'm going all in, it's my last chance!
You're out of options, Bob. This is my final offer!
I'm not backing down, I'll take everything!
